}}'''Alexander Siddig''' is a Sudanese-born English actor. He is best known for his role as Dr. Julian Bashir in ''Star Trek: Deep Space Nine''. He has appeared in films such as ''Reign of Fire'', ''Kingdom of Heaven'', ''Syriana'', ''Clash of the Titans'' and ''The Fifth Estate'' as well as TV series such as ''Spooks'', ''24'', ''Family Guy''â€‹,Â ''Merlin'' and ''Da Vinci's Demons''.

"Siddig" is pronounced as two distinct syllables: "Sid-dig", with the emphasis on the second syllable.

â€‹In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'', he will portray Prince [[Doran Martell]] in the [[Season 5|fifth season]].<ref>[http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/07/25/sdcc-14-game-of-thrones-season-5-casting-announced IGN: ''Game of Thrones'' Season 5 Casting Announced]</ref>
